org.jbei.ice.lib.access

Class Permission

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.access.Permission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IDataModel

    @Entity
@ClassBridge(name="permission",
             analyze=NO,
             impl=PermissionEntryBridge.class)
public class Permission
extends Object
implements IDataModel
    Permission object for storing permissions related to either folders or entries on an account or group basis
    Author:
    Hector Plahar
